lead_paragraph: More investors are committing money to socially responsible funds, and companies are rolling out offerings. But it can be hard to determine what funds will and won’t invest in.

headline.print_headline: Follow Your Conscience Without Losing Your Shirt
headline.main: Follow Your Conscience Without Losing Your Shirt

snippet: More investors are committing money to socially responsible funds, and companies are rolling out offerings. But it can be hard to determine what funds will and won’t invest in.
abstract: Ethical investors face challenges in understanding exact makeup of socially responsible mutual funds, sector that is experiencing significant growth; fund managers define rules differently, and funds can be comprised of hundreds of stocks that are difficult to parse.
